posts.postText:
Two notes

1. Unlocked forums because the vote was timed, the option to open forums won and ben just increased it and added a new bullshit til everyone votes (which won't happen). So i'll unlock it until ben comes back and locks it, gash locks it, or the vote ends and they say yes.

2. because im also not putting up with the bullshit to send a ticket.
